required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Subjective Outcomes After ACL Reconstruction With BQT Autograft
clinical_study.official_title: Subjective Outcomes After ACL Reconstruction With BQT Autograft

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of the study is to compare short-term patient reported outcome measures (PROM) of Bone-Quadriceps-Tendon (BQT) autograft with Semitendinosus-Gracilis (STG) and Bone-Patellar-Tendon-Bone (BPTB) autografts following Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction (ACLR).
The PROM used are Knee Injury and Osteoarthrithis Outcome Score (KOOS) and Tegner. Difference in change in KOOS, KOOS subscales and Tegner from preoperative baseline to one-year follow-up and absolute KOOS, KOOS subscales and Tegner at one-year follow-up were evaluated. All of which were BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively. The primary outcome is change in KOOS from preoperative baselinge to one-year follow-up. Other outcomes are secondary.
The hypothesis was that patients receiving the BQT autograft show similar results in KOOS, KOOS subscales and Tegner as patients receiving STG or BPTB autografts.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score from preoperative baseline to one-year follow-up
primary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score subscale Pain from preoperative baseline to one-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score subscale Symptoms from preoperative baseline to one-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score subscale Activities of Daily Living (ADL) from preoperative baseline to one-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score subscale Sports/Recreation from preoperative baseline to one-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score subscale Quality of Life (QoL) from preoperative baseline to one-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Tegner activity score from preoperative baseline to one-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

secondary_outcome.measure: Absolute results of Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score subscale Pain at one-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

secondary_outcome.measure: Absolute results of Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score subscale Symptoms at one-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

secondary_outcome.measure: Absolute results of Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score subscale Activities of Daily Living (ADL) at one-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

secondary_outcome.measure: Absolute results of Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score subscale Sports/Recreation at one-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

secondary_outcome.measure: Absolute results of Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score subscale Quality of Life (QoL) at one-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

secondary_outcome.measure: Absolute results of Tegner activity score at one-year follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: BQT compared to STG and BPTB, respectively

arm_group.description: Patients treated with the Bone Quadriceps Tendon (BQT) autograft
Patients treated with the Semitendinosus-Gracilis (STG) autograft
Patients treated with the Bone-Patellar Tendon-Bone (BPTB) autograft

intervention.description: The choice of graft at primary ACL Reconstruction

study_pop.textblock: Patients from the nationwide Danish Knee Ligament Reconstruction Register (DKLR) recruited from both private and public clinics from January 1st 2005 through December 31st 2018.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
-
Exclusion Criteria:
- Revision ACL Surgery
- Multiligament surgery
- Nonresponders in PROM at preoperative baseline or one-year follow-up
